Module Vue_component

type js_type =
| JString of string
| JObject of Mjs.any
| JNumber of float
| JBoolean of bool
| JArray of Mjs.any list

JS constructor

type prop_object = {
pr_default : js_type;
pr_required : bool option;
pr_validator : (string -> bool) option;
}

generic prop object

type prop_options =
| PrType of js_type
| PrTypeArray of js_type list
| PrObj of prop_object

possible types for prop

type props_options =
| PrsArray of string list
| PrsObj of (string * prop_options) list

possible types for props argument
